data_table.description: MRI Procedure Form, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MPRA1
variable.description: Status of MRI procedure. Q1 [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MPRA2
variable.description: The reason MRI was not attempted. Q2 [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]
variable.value: Refused to sign informed consent form

variable.name: MPRA5
variable.description: Was oblique axial scan parallel to the AC/PC line? Q5 [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MPRA6A
variable.description: Were any emergent alert conditions noted? Q6a [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MPRA6B
variable.description: Specify the alert condition. Q6b [ABNORMAL SIGNAL, CLAUSTRAPHOBIC, EVAL HIGH T2 SI, EVALARACHNOID C, NONE,PITUITARY MASS, POSS TUMOR BRAI, SUBDURAL HEMATO, ]. [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MPRA7
variable.description: MRI technologist initials. Q7 [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MPRAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [MRI Procedure Form] [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MPRA4A
variable.description: Record the order of Scanning Pulse Sequence. (If all series were completed in order, enter 1, 2, 3). Q4a [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]
variable.value: Options: Series 1: T1 Sagittal 1; Series 2: Spin density/T2 Oblique Axial 2; Series 3: Oblique Axial 3; Other 4

variable.name: MPRA4B
variable.description: Order of scanning pulse sequence B [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]

variable.name: MPRA4C
variable.description: Order of scanning pulse sequence C [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [MRI Procedure Form, exam 3]
